text: Shocking report on America's healthcare affordability crisis! 😱💸 Did you know that many Americans can only afford a max of $97/month for out-of-pocket medical costs? 🤯 Preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed due to unaffordability! 😔 It's time for change! PayZen is stepping up with AI-powered solutions to tackle this crisis and ensure everyone can access the healthcare they need. 💪🏼
